 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בִּאישׁ‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 11, 8b</sup>)] **adjective** ==bad== (so Egyptian Aramaic [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>75. 2</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בִּישׁ‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — feminine singular emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וּבִאישְׁתָּא‎</span> [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]] rebellious ***and bad*** city (not <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בִּאוּשְׁתָָּא‎</span>, see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>n</sup>.). <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בָּאתַר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בָּתַר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתַר‎</span>.
